defines.label: Average
defines.description: An average of observations made over the given time window.

defines.label: Count
defines.description: The total count over the given time window.

defines.label: Instant
defines.description: An instantaneous observation recorded at single point in time.

defines.label: Maximum
defines.description: The maximum value observed over the given time window.

defines.label: Minimum
defines.description: The minimum value observed over the given time window.

defines.label: Sum
defines.description: The sum of values observed over the given time window.
